name: PubsubToLogPipeline
description: Reads messages from a Google Cloud Pub/Sub subscription and logs them. Designed for use as a Dataflow Flex Template.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.label: Google Cloud Project ID
parameters.helpText: The ID of your Google Cloud Project where the Pub/Sub subscription is located. (e.g., 'your-gcp-project-id')

parameters.name: subscription_name
parameters.label: Pub/Sub Subscription Name
parameters.helpText: The name of the Pub/Sub subscription to read messages from (e.g., 'my-beam-subscription').
